fullText:
Eager Charger

Prerequisite: Mul, barbarian, swift charge power
Benefit: You gain a +1 racial bonus to speed when charging. In addition, you gain a power bonus to the damage roll of the charge attack granted by your swift charge power equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 391.
